name: RemoveLocationCustomAttribute
description:
Delete a custom attribute from a location.

Use this tool to delete a custom attribute associated with a specific location. The attribute must have a visibility setting of `VISIBILITY_READ_WRITE_VALUES` if owned by another application.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the target location where the custom attribute will be deleted.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description: The key of the custom attribute to delete, matching the key of a custom attribute definition in the Square seller account. Use the qualified key if not the definition owner.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
